name: Coeus Plan
description:
Immerse yourself in an epic space battle with alien enemies.

The background of the story takes place in outer space in 2513. In order to survive, mankind decided to fight aliens.
The main goal is to destroy as many enemy aircraft as possible.
Game features:
A true first-person driving experience
Fast-paced space battle
Fly into the sky, bomb the enemy, shoot the enemy aircraft, and look forward to your path to the ace pilot!
